title: NADDPod Plays Paradox Perfect! Part One: "Costneresque Character Creation"
itunes:title: NADDPod Plays Paradox Perfect! Part One: "Costneresque Character Creation"
description:
It's Paradox Perfect Round 2, and this time we're joined by the 2-Crew for time travel-based shenanigans! First up: the silliest worldbuilding and character creation process you've ever heard! The goofs fly fast and thick in this one, folks!
Embrace the Costner

Check out the Paradox Perfect game here, and you can follow the creator at @taytaysensei! 

Check out our incredible guests at https://www.naddpod.com/! 

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
